scripts.build:css: postcss app/static/css/tailwind.css -o app/static/css/tailwind-built.css && sass app/static/css/styles.scss app/static/css/styles.css --no-source-map
scripts.watch:css: postcss app/static/css/tailwind.css -o app/static/css/tailwind-built.css && sass --watch app/static/css/styles.scss app/static/css/styles.css --no-source-map
